#Installing Packages
```{r include=FALSE}
source("https://raw.github.com/neilhatfield/STAT461/master/rScripts/checkSetup.R")
checkSetup()
packages <- c("tidyverse", "hasseDiagram", "knitr", "kableExtra", "car", "psych", "parameters", "dplyr") 
lapply(packages, library, character.only = TRUE)
options(knitr.kable.NA = "")
options(contrasts = c("contr.sum", "contr.poly"))
source("https://raw.github.com/neilhatfield/STAT461/master/rScripts/ANOVATools.R")

```

#factors
```{r}
Data <- Data %>%
  dplyr::mutate( 
    production = dplyr::recode_factor( 
      production, 
      "< 3 years" = "< 3 years",
      "3-5 years" = "3-5 years", 
      ">5 years" = "> 5 years", "> 5 years" = "> 5 years" 
    )
  )

Data$genre <- as.factor(Data$genre)
Data$series <- as.factor(Data$series)
Data$exclusive <- as.factor(Data$exclusive)
Data$production <- as.factor(Data$production)
Data$post <- as.factor(Data$post)
levels(Data$production)
str(Data)
```

#Create Model
```{r}
GameModel<- aov(
  formula = copies ~ production
)
```
